name: Fish stock
keywords: celery, fish, white wine, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds bones from a white-fleshed, non-oily fish, including heads, if possible, but with gills removed
3 sprigs fresh thyme, or 1 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: If the fish heads are used, the gills must be removed. Rinse the bones under cold running water. Drain and place the bones in a kettle or deep saucepan. Add the remaining ingredients. Bring to the boil and simmer for 20 minutes. Strain.
